transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning ma'am, main Aman baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji sir boliye.
Executive: Ma'am please thoda important hai. Actually us din bhi video meet hui thi, aap uske baad se bhi koi changes vagera nahi kiye. Koi file ke consumption nahi ho rahe hain. Issue kahan par aa raha hai mujhe batayenge ek baar? 
Customer: Isliye na sir, nahi nahi baat mera suniye isliye na ki hum log do teen din se usko chala hi nahi rahe hain. Isliye na kyunki hum log ko teen mahina hone wala hai aur ek bhi buyer nahi mila. Ye aisa nahi hai ki hum log isko chala nahi rahe hain. Jab ye hum logo ne purchase kiya tha, pehle aap meri baat sun lijiye, theek hai? Jab maine ye purchase kiya tha uske baad lagatar humne do mahine every day line up kiya hai. Aap chahe to buyer meter mein jaake dekh lijiyega humne kitna logo ko approach kiya hai samne se taki wo reply kare. Par wahan se koi reply nahi aaya hai. Humne kaha tha hume call ke liye, humne khas karke call ke liye isko kiya tha. Iron scrap as a extra tha. Wo agar chalega usme agar dikhta hai to hum log ko usme interest tha hum log ko lekin zyada tar hum log call ke liye kiye the aur maine ye pehle hi kaha tha ki 25 ton se starting hona chahiye uske baad wo jitna jayega hum log available kara denge. Lekin jab hume convert karna rehta hai tab se do ton, paanch ton, 10 ton, 100 kg, 200 kg aise dikh raha hai to utna to hum log nahi karenge na?
Executive: Nahi bilkul main, maine disagree nahi kara aapke baat se lekin ma'am jab se maine isme kuch changes kiye the uske baad se ma'am agar aap panel agar open karke dekhiye to almost
Customer: Main bol rahi hu aap main abhi open karke aap
Executive: Aap ek minute aap video meet pe aaiye main aapko saath ke saath mein lead consume bhi karwaunga. Theek hai aur padi leads bhi dikhaunga. Main isi number pe video meeting ka link share kar raha hu. Join kijiye please. Kar sakte hain ma'am? Possible hai?
Customer: Theek hai, bhejiye.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am, abhi line pe rahiyega main aapke saath saath on call hi bhej raha hu main.
Customer: Theek hai aap link bhejiye, main system on karti hu, bhejiye.
Executive: Haan tab tak aap open kijiye please.

(silence)

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan. Hello.
Executive: Ma'am check kijiye main link share kar rakha hai aapke saath mein.
Customer: Hmm, kar rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyers in three months.

- Leads are not as per requirement.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive shared the video meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, video meet
